name: Turn Back Time
description:
Turn Back Time is the outcome of one of my  Game-A-Week's from my Year 2 University module 'Game Design',  the purpose of these weeks was to experiment and learn.

The theme of this week was "Game that tune" in which my choice was a puzzle game based on the song Cher - If I could turn back time.

This idea sounded a lot better in writing than it did in execution, the "turning back time" essentially amounted to the player having more time to solve the maze, although it didn't come together I still consider this a success for a Game-A-Week as  it is functional and I learned a lot creating this.
